Title: Relates to unauthorized entities, unregistered mortgage brokers and mortgage fraud
Summary: Relates to unauthorized entities, unregistered mortgage brokers and mortgage fraud; establishes additional penalties against unlicensed or unregistered persons or entities engaging in activities after receiving a cease and desist notice; relates to the crime of mortgage fraud.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law and the penal law, in relation to unauthorized entities, unregistered mortgage brokers and mortgage fraud
